# archestra_prompt_versions (Data Source)

Lists all versions of a specific Archestra prompt. This data source is useful for looking up prompt versions and their details.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "archestra_prompt_versions" "example" {
  prompt_id = "prompt-id-here"
}

output "prompt_versions" {
  value       = data.archestra_prompt_versions.example.versions
  description = "All prompt versions data"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `prompt_id` (String) The ID of the prompt

### Read-Only

- `versions` (Attributes List) List of prompt versions (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--versions))

<a id="nestedatt--versions"></a>
### Nested Schema for `versions`

Read-Only:

- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp
- `id` (String) Version identifier
- `name` (String) Name of the prompt version
- `system_prompt` (String) System prompt content
- `user_prompt` (String) User prompt content
- `version` (Number) Version number
